WorkItem.Description: In Rawr, abyssal rune (trinket ID:47213) does not have its proc listed, which is "Equip: Each time you cast a harmful spell, you have a chance to gain 590 spell power for 10 sec.". Ive tried refreshing the item data, but it still doesnt show up. Why is this and how can i fix it?
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoSham] Abyssal Rune proc quality is not counted

Comments.Message: It is also missing from Tears of the Vanquished (Trinket ID:47215) Both drop from normal mode Trial of the Champion.
You can edit the item to give it a special effect matching that description, until we model it.

Regarding the Tears of the Vanquished I noticed this:
- RestoShaman: no effect
- Tree: equals about 11 MP5
- Healadin: equals about 49 MP5
- HolyPriest: equals about 48 MP5
- should be: slightly less than 50 MP5, so Healadin and HolyPriest are correct

As my two main healers are a RestoShaman and a tree, I change the item's stats to 50 MP5 manually for now.
Fixed for tree, but still not working for RestoShaman.
Reopened, as it still is broken for Tree.
Err.... Meant still broken for RestoSham. It works for Tree.
The proc is also not listed for warlocks.
err ignore my last comment I was looking at the wrong trinket.
Abyssal Rune will never work for RestoSham, it's a damage spell proc.  I'm working on getting Tears of the Vanquished working, appears Mana Restore is not being added in for any such trinket.
Appears the issue is deeper then expected, will take some time to get a fix in for as the special effect triggers inside restosham aren't working as expected.
Fixed in Most recent commit (41467).  Issue will be closed as fixed by end of week if there are no further issues with it.
